## Scene.isCameraActive() method

Specifies if the camera is currently active and streaming video to the server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isCameraActive(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`boolean`

Usage:

```javascript
const isCameraActive = scene.isCameraActive();
```
